servinfo.title: Rear Wheel Encoder On-Vehicle Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Rear Wheel Speed Sensor Removal and Installation

servinfo.ptxt: Before inspect rear wheel encoder, remove rear drive shaft referring to Rear Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly:Rear .

item.ptxt: Check encoder (1) for being crack, damaged or deformed.
Turn wheel and check if encoder rotation is free from eccentricity and looseness.
Check that no foreign material is attached.
If any faulty is found, repair or replace. Refer to Rear Wheel Hub Assembly Removal and Installation .
